name: Guardian Stone
description:
This game is our entry for Ludum Dare 39. Theme: Running out of power.

This time, we wanted to create a story based game. The result is a visual novel with some puzzles.

You play Princess Sophia, who is put in charge of the Guardian Stone that protects the kingdom from the monsters. But the stone's power is fading...

Controls: mouse.

Team:

Johannes P. Alef: Writitng, additional programming and graphics

Nikola Aulig: Programming

Rebecca Schieren: Graphics

Hong Linh Thai: Music, programming

Technology: Unity, Krita, Gimp, Cubase Elements
